Control Name: 4.8.5 A failure path has been simulated for cross-premises connectivity.
Control Statement: Has a failure path been simulated to ensure connectivity is available over alternative paths? i.e. using S2S as a backup for Express Route.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 4.8 What decisions have been taken to ensure networking and connectivity meets your reliability requirements?
